rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 1 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 1:00 AM, 03 July 2025(Thursday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Metro Manila, Bataan and Cavite.

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: Possible FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, expect light to moderate with occasional heavy rains over Laguna, Nueva Ecija and Tarlac within the next 3 hours.

Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Rizal, Quezon, Zambales, Pampanga, Bulacan and Batangas which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 2:00 AM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Watch #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:00 PM, 02 July 2025



Thunderstorm is MORE LIKELY to develop over Greater Metro Manila Area(Metro Manila, Bulacan, Rizal, Laguna and Cavite) within 12 hours. 



All are advised to continue monitoring for updates.
